articles.content:

articles.title: Robertson pushes point streak to 17 with hat trick, Stars shut out Ducks - NHL.com
articles.description: Jason Robertson scored a hat trick and extended his point streak to an NHL career-high 17 games for the Dallas Stars in a 5-0 win against the Anaheim Ducks at American Airlines Center on Thursday.
